title: New: Liyv – You’re Not Going to Ruin My Life
content:
I’m a sucker for a sad song.

Sometimes it can be all to easy to wallow in the regret that surrounds the end of a relationship, thankfully in the case of this new track from Seattle’s Liyv, it’s the absolute opposite. Instead of what ifs and maybes, it’s a middle finger stuck up to an abusive, calculating, manipulating and careless partner. Tear up the photographs, block their number and throwaway their shitty clothes; you deserve more than that, I deserve more than that – You’re Not Going to Ruin My Life.

Like this? Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
